import React,{useState, useEffect} from 'react'; import { mail_send } from '../lib/utility'; export default()=>{ const [name, email, phone, message]= useState(""); const handleChangeName = e => { setName((prev)=>prev=e.target.value) } const handleChangeEmail = e => { setEmail((prev)=>prev=e.target.value) } const handleChangePhone = e => { setPhone((prev)=>prev=e.target.value) } const handleChangeMessage = e => { setMessage((prev)=>prev=e.target.value) } const handleSubmit = event => { mail_send(email,message, name, phone); } return(

Contact Me

Have questions? I have answers.

Want to get in touch? Fill out the form below to send me a message and I will get back to you as soon as possible!


); }
